import React from 'react' import { Background, Container, Content, AnimationContainer } from './styles' import Button from '../../components/Button' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Input from '../../components/Input' import { FiUser, FiMail, FiLock } from 'react-icons/fi' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import * as yup from 'yup' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' const Signup = () => { const schema = yup.object().shape({ name: yup.string().required('Campo obrigatório!'), email: yup.string().required('Campo obrigatório!').email('Email inválido'), password: yup.string().required('Campo obrigatório!').min(8, 'Mínimo de 8 dígitos'), confirmPassword: yup.string().required('Campo obrigatório!') }) const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema) }) const onSubmitFunction = (data) => { console.log(data) } return (
handleSubmit(onSubmitFunction)}>

) } export default Signup
